name: Jose Manuel Sanchez-Castro
official_cause_of_death: Under investigation by Pierce County Medical Examiner (suspected fentanyl withdrawal complications)

timeline.event: Voluntarily deported to Mexico one week after first arrest
Caught illegally entering the country (8th time between 2009 and July 2024)
Arrived at Northwest ICE Processing Center, placed in medical isolation for fentanyl withdrawal
911 call at 7:05 AM for medical services - reported unresponsive but breathing

discrepancies.ice_claim: Detainee was placed in medical isolation for fentanyl withdrawal
discrepancies.counter_evidence: Advocacy group La Resistencia alleged ICE violated its own detention standards requiring immediate transfer to appropriate medical facility for 'severe, life-threatening intoxication or withdrawal symptoms'
Only 5 days elapsed between arrival at facility and death, raising questions about adequacy of withdrawal treatment protocols

sources.title: ICE releases identity of latest death at Tacoma detention center
Mexican National in ICE Custody Dies at NWIPC

notes: Had prior convictions for resisting arrest and manufacture/delivery of methamphetamine in Yakima County. This was the second death at Northwest ICE Processing Center in 2024.
